allQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
allQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

allQuotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
allQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

allQuotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
allQuotes.author: Winston Churchill

allQuotes.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
allQuotes.author: Aristotle

allQuotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
allQuotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

allQuotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
allQuotes.author: Dr. Seuss

allQuotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
allQuotes.author: Lao Tzu

allQuotes.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
allQuotes.author: T. Tolis

allQuotes.quote: I have died every day waiting for you. Darling, don’t be afraid. I have loved you for a thousand years. I’ll love you for a thousand more.
allQuotes.author: Christina Perri

allQuotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
allQuotes.author: Maya Angelou

allQuotes.quote: I wish I could turn back the clock. I’d find you sooner and love you longer.
allQuotes.author: Unknown

allQuotes.quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
allQuotes.author: Conan Doyle

allQuotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
allQuotes.author: Nicholas Sparks
